title: Secret Nazi Bases at the South Pole? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/19/18
itunes:title: Secret Nazi Bases at the South Pole? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/19/18
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and an open lines caller debate the existence of secret Nazi bases located at the South Pole, and how their existence is being hidden from the public.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
